attributes.action: Formula 1 should not be moved to Sky
attributes.additional_details: Formula One is a sport that is inherently British, the first ever race was held here and right now the sport is full of British teams and excellent British drivers, it would be such a loss for the British public for it to be moved to a pay per view channel such Sky Sports. In this climate people cannot afford the £487 that it would cost for SD alone. We the British license payers urge you to do all in your power to ensure that the BBC keeps Formula 1 broadcasting all the races and all other sessions live, as it does now.
